src:
Ini Susunan Lengkap Exco PSSI Periode 2019-2023
03 Nov 2019, 16:34 by Anggi Tiar


Ini Susunan Lengkap Exco PSSI Periode 2019-2023

KBRN, Jakarta : Kongres Luar Biasa (KLB) Pemilihan Persatuan Sepak Bola Seluruh Indonesia (PSSI) telah selesai dilaksanakan di Hotel Shangri-La, Jakarta, Sabtu (2/11/2019) kemarin. Dalam KLB tersebut telah terpilih 15 anggota Komite Eksekutif (Exco) PSSI periode 2019-2023 yang terdiri dari Ketua Umum, Wakil Ketua Umum 1, Wakil Ketua Umum 2 dan 12 anggota. Seperti diberitakan rri.co.id sebelumnya, tonggak kepemimpinan PSSI kini dipegang oleh Mochamad Iriawan. Pri yang akrab disapa Iwan Bule itu terpilih menjadi Ketua Umum PSSi seelah menang mutlak meraih 82 suara dari total 85 voters yang hadir. Adapun tiga suara lainnya abstain. Sementara satu suara lagi tidak ikut memilih alias walk out yakni perwakilan Persis Solo.Terpilihnya Iwan Bule menjadi orang nomor satu di induk sepak bola Tanah Air itu bakal didampingi Cucu Somantri dan Iwan Budianto yang bakal menjabat sebagai wakil ketua umum 1 dan 2. Sedangkan, dalam anggota eksekutif (exco) PSSI, nama-nama lama seperti Yoyok Sukawi, Dirk Soplanit, Juni Rahman, Pieter Tanuri, dan Yunus Nusi kembali terpilih. Sementara sisanya merupakan wajah-wajah baru. Berikut susunan lengkap Komite Eksekutif (Exco) PSSI periode 2019-2023:Ketua Umum: Mochamad IriawanWakil Ketua Umum 1:  Iwan BudiantoWakil Ketua Umum 2: Cucu SoemantriAnggota:1. A.S Sukawijaya2. Dirk Soplanit3. Endri Erawan4. Haruna Soemitro5. Hasnuryadi Sulaiman6. Pieter Tanuri7. Sonhadji8. Juni Rahman9. Ahmad Riyadh10. Yunus Nusi11. Hasani Abdul Gani12. Vivin Cahyani
text:
This Completion Exco PSSI Period 2019-2023
03 Nov 2019, 16:34 by Anggi Tiar


This Completion Exco PSSI Period 2019-2023

KBRN, Jakarta: Extraordinary Congress (KLB) Election of the Indonesian Football Association (PSSI) has been completed at the Shangri-La Hotel, Jakarta, Saturday (11/2/2019) yesterday. In the KLB, 15 members of the PSSI Executive Committee (Exco) for the 2019-2023 period were elected, consisting of the Chairperson, Deputy Chairperson 1, Deputy Chairperson 2 and 12 members. As previously reported by rri.co.id, the PSSI leadership milestone is now held by Mochamad Iriawan. Pri, who is familiarly called Iwan Bule, was elected as the General Chairman of PSSi after winning absolutely won 82 votes from a total of 85 voters who attended. The other three abstentions. While one more vote did not participate in choosing the alias walk out, namely representatives of Persis Solo.The election of Iwan Bule to become the number one person in the motherland of soccer will be accompanied by Cucu Somantri and Iwan Budianto who will serve as deputy chairmen 1 and 2. Meanwhile, in PSSI executive members (exco), old names such as Yoyok Sukawi, Dirk Soplanit, Juni Rahman, Pieter Tanuri, and Yunus Nusi were re-elected. While the rest are new faces. The following is the complete composition of the PSSI Executive Committee (Exco) 2019-2023 period: General Chairperson: Mochamad Iriawan Deputy Chairperson 1: Iwan Budianto Deputy Chairperson 2: Cucu Soemantri Members: 1. U.S Sukawijaya2. Dirk Soplanit3. Endri Erawan4. Haruna Soemitro5. Hasnuryadi Sulaiman6. Pieter Tanuri7. Sonhadji8. June Rahman9. Ahmad Riyadh10. Jonah Nusi11. Hasani Abdul Gani12. Vivin Cahyani
